content:
# I have successfully gathered 5 units of iron ore in addition to the 5 units of coal I collected earlier.
# Now that I have both coal and iron ore, I can proceed to smelt the iron ore into iron plates, which are essential for crafting further items.

# Step 16: I will now craft a Stone Furnace to smelt the iron ore.
# First, I need to ensure I have enough resources to craft the furnace.
ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Ensuring I can craft a Stone Furnace.
